Detailed Description

The InterfaceMinder class manages a set of interface elements.

It provides an iterator for iterating over this set.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Mercury::InterfaceMinder::InterfaceMinder ( const char *  name  ) 

This is the default constructor.

It initialises the InterfaceMinder without any interfaces.

Parameters:
name Name of the interface.
